data.text: @TheIsraelLaryea It's so simple. But Government think otherwise. In fact per observations everyone in Government may have a common goal. Thus Looting-blackmans business

@cjosei @TheIsraelLaryea please take time and watch his presentation on the subject of country's economy. from your writings, it is pretty clear you have not appraise yourself with what he has been saying on the economy before this world bank info. youtube can help.

@TheIsraelLaryea They're always ready to issue such vague statements in order to achieve a certain effect. What's he calling "transparency" in this context? His next move will be to call on govt to sign up to a "suicide" program.

@shun_kabral @TheIsraelLaryea Since when? 
2012? 
2016? 
2018? 
"Predates COVID-19" is actually meaningless, unless he is doing PARTISAN POLITICS and he actually means the period of this government (2017-2019). Then he should be specific and show the data that supports what he is saying.

@TheIsraelLaryea I can say for sure, this man is playing politics for the @WorldBank once again. This is because both the @WorldBank and Ghana have been issuing reports since 2017. So what is it that has to be made TRANSPARENT that IS NOT in existing reports of both so-called partners?
@TheIsraelLaryea Sitting there with his triple chin and distended abdomen. I don't blame him at all 😂😂😂😂😂😂
@TheIsraelLaryea 🙄😳 The economy messiah... Zero! Tweaaa! https://t.co/PxjAjpkQgU
@TheIsraelLaryea Hon. Adongo come collect your stone ooo...the issue has been there since since...
